documentation.text:
By default, the company can transfer a BuyNow player without forcing
 the blockchain to check the owner's signature. This is to safe gas.
 The company has obviously checked it off-chain, and receiving a player is
 always a good thing.
 However, Users can opt-out from allowing the company to put BuyNow players in their teams:

When the player has been frozen in the crypto market, 
 it won't be available in the FIAT market (or in any other) until auction finises
maxSumSkills can only grow if enough time has passed

documentation.text: Lowering maxSumSkills can always be made instantly, as this restricts the company further.

arguments.value: FreezePlayer requirements not met
true

documentation.text:
Freezes the player, preventing it from trading in any other market for "validUntil" time.
 This is suposed to be triggered only when a valid buyer has been found.
 If offerValindUntil != 0 => the put for sale comes from an offer. 
     - Then, although the seller specified validUntil too (!=0), we set auctionId = hash(sellerHidden, playerId, offerValidUntil)
 If offerValindUntil = 0 => the put for sale comes out of the blue. Then, auctionId = hash(sellerHidden, playerId, validUntil)

documentation.text:
Main function for a user to immeditely remove a player from his/her team
 It can either return it to the Academy (potentially resold again by the Academy owner)
 Or retire the player forever, remaining in the original team, but not occupying
 one of the 25 players slots.

arguments.value: player not in transit
target team cannot be null

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "cannot complete player transit because targetTeam is still full"

arguments.value: cannot complete player transit because targetTeam is still full

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "cannot complete player transit because targetTeam is still full"

documentation.text:
When a player has been put in IN_TRANSIT (due to more than 25 players in a team)
 Then it can be given to the target team executing this function, if at least one slot is available.
 This function can be called by anyone who wants to pay the gas
Private functions

Freezes the player, preventing it from trading in any other market for "validUntil" time.
 This is suposed to be triggered only when a valid buyer has been found.

     - Then, although the seller specified validUntil too (!=0), we set auctionId = hash(sellerHidden, playerId, offerValidUntil)
 If offerValindUntil = 0 => the put for sale comes out of the blue. Then, auctionId = hash(sellerHidden, playerId, validUntil)

encodeTZCountryAndVal(uint8,uint256,uint.details: PlayerId and TeamId both serialize a total of 43 bits:     timeZone        = 5 bits     countryIdxInTZ  = 10 bits     val             = 28 bits (either  (playerIdxInCountry or teamIdxInCountry)*

addAcquisitionConstraint(uint256,uint32,.notice: TODO: require signature from team owner

completePlayerTransit(uint256).notice: When a player has been put in IN_TRANSIT (due to more than 25 players in a team) Then it can be given to the target team executing this function, if at least one slot is available. This function can be called by anyone who wants to pay the gas

dismissPlayer(uint256,uint256,bytes32,by.notice: Main function for a user to immeditely remove a player from his/her team It can either return it to the Academy (potentially resold again by the Academy owner) Or retire the player forever, remaining in the original team, but not occupying one of the 25 players slots.

freezePlayer(bytes32,uint256,bytes32[2],.notice: Freezes the player, preventing it from trading in any other market for "validUntil" time. This is suposed to be triggered only when a valid buyer has been found. If offerValindUntil != 0 => the put for sale comes from an offer.      - Then, although the seller specified validUntil too (!=0), we set auctionId = hash(sellerHidden, playerId, offerValidUntil) If offerValindUntil = 0 => the put for sale comes out of the blue. Then, auctionId = hash(sellerHidden, playerId, validUntil)

freezeTeam(bytes32,uint256,bytes32[2],ui.notice: Teams follow the same pattern as players

getOwnerTeamInCountry(uint8,uint256,uint.notice: returns NULL_ADDR if team is bot

getPlayerIdsInTeam(uint256).notice: TODO: we really don't need this function. Only for external use. Consider removal

hashPrivateMsg(uint8,uint256,uint256).notice: this function is not used in the contract. It's only for external helps

isSigned(address,bytes32,uint8,bytes32,b.notice: (currently not used) checks if the signature of a message says that it was signed by the provided address

lowerNewMaxSumSkillsBuyNowPlayer(uint256.notice: Lowering maxSumSkills can always be made instantly, as this restricts the company further.

nextTimeZoneToUpdate().notice: each day has 24 hours, each with 4 verses => 96 verses per day. day = 0,..13 turnInDay = 0, 1, 2, 3 so for each TZ, we go from (day, turn) = (0, 0) ... (13,3) => a total of 14*4 = 56 turns per tz from these, all map easily to timeZones

prefixed(bytes32).notice: Builds a prefixed hash to mimic the behavior of eth_sign.

recoverAddr(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes3.notice: FUNCTIONS FOR SIGNATURE MANAGEMENT retrieves the addr that signed a message

setIsBuyNowAllowedByOwner(uint256,bool).notice: By default, the company can transfer a BuyNow player without forcing the blockchain to check the owner's signature. This is to safe gas. The company has obviously checked it off-chain, and receiving a player is always a good thing. However, Users can opt-out from allowing the company to put BuyNow players in their teams:

setIsPlayerFrozenCrypto(uint256,bool).notice: When the player has been frozen in the crypto market,  it won't be available in the FIAT market (or in any other) until auction finises

setNewMaxSumSkillsBuyNowPlayer(uint256,u.notice: maxSumSkills can only grow if enough time has passed

timeZoneToUpdatePure(uint256,uint8).notice: tz0  : v = 0, V_DAY, 2 * V_DAY... tzN  : v = 4N + V_DAY * day,  day = 0,...6 tzN  : v = 4N + V_DAY * day,  day = 0,...6  => tzN - tz0 = (v - V_DAY*day)  => 4 tzN = 4 tz0 + v % VERSES_PER_DAY last : v = V_DAY + DELTA + V_DAY * 6  Imagine 2 tzs: 0:00 - tz0; 0:30 - NUL; 1:00 - tz1; 1:30 - tz0; 0:00 - tz0; 0:30 - tz1; So the last
